titleStmt.title: A proclamation for calling together the militia on this side of Tay, and the fencible men in some shires Edinburgh, the thirtieth day of March, 1689.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament.
Gibson, Alexander, Sir, d. 1693.

notesStmt.note: Countersigned at end: Al. Gibson cls.
Reproduction of original in the National Library of Scotland (Advocates'), Edinburgh.
